1806219 THE PREVENTION OF INSULTS TO NATIONAL HONOUR (AMENDMENT) ACT, 2005
NO. 51 OF 2005 [ 20th December, 2005.]
An Act further to amend the prevention of Insults to National Honour Act, 1971.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- sixth Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
488941 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Prevention of Insults to National Honour (Amendment) Act, 2005.
870025 2 Amendment of section 2 of Act 69 of 1971.- In the Prevention of Insults to National Honour Act, 1971, in section 2, in Explanation 4, for clause (e), the following clause shall be substituted, namely:- " (e) using the Indian National Flag,-
1698768 ias a portion of costume, uniform or accessory of any description which is worn below the waist of any person; or
1640772 iiby embroidering or printing it on cushions, handkerchiefs, napkins, undergarments or any dress material; or". T. K. VISWANATHAN,
Secy. to the Govt. of India.
